00031 /*
00032  * Uncomment one of the following two lines to support PEC.
00033  * If both lines are commented out, no PEC support is included.
00034  */

00036 //#define SMB_USE_PEC_CALCULATION

00039 #define SMB_OWN_ADDRESS       0x05 // Reserved address. Not for production.

00045 #define SMB_RX_MAX_LENGTH       32
00046 
00047 /*
00048  *  Maximum number of data bytes transmitted for Block read and Block write,
00049  *  block read process call. (Max value is 32).
00050  */

00142 {
00143     unsigned char txLength;                         
00144     unsigned char txCount;
